pkgmetadata.longdescription: Helper Functions for Use with the 'ncdf4' Package // Contains a collection of helper functions for dealing with 'NetCDF' files https://www.unidata.ucar.edu/software/netcdf/ opened using 'ncdf4', particularly 'NetCDF' files that conform to the Climate and Forecast (CF) Metadata Conventions http://cfconventions.org/Data/cf-conventions/cf-conventions-1.7 /cf-conventions.html.
